word: "What shall I do," asked the lawyer, "That I may have eternal life?" Said Christ, "What saith the Scripture? How readest Thou?" And he answering said, "Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart and with all thy soul and with all they strength and with all thy mind; and thy neighbor as thyself." Christ said to him, "Thou hast answered right; this do, and thou shalt live."
